content: child s market bag version a2 january 6 2007 materials needed - 3 oz of worsted weight yarn i used fisherman s wool - h hook or hook needed to obtain gauge gauge 4 sts per inch in double_crochet starting at the bottom of the bag w/ h hook chain 6 join w/ slip_stitch to 1st chain to form a ring being careful not to twist the chain round 1 chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet now and throughout 2 double_crochet in the ring chain 3 3 double_crochet in ring chain 3 3 times join w/ slip_stitch to top of beg chain 3 round 2 slip_stitch in next 2 double_crochet and in next chain 3 space chain 3 2 double_crochet in chain space chain 3 3 double_crochet in same chain 3 space chain 1 3 double_crochet in next chain 3 space chain 3 3 double_crochet in same chain 3 space chain 1 repeat around round 3 slip_stitch in next 2 double_crochet and in next chain 3 space chain 3 2 double_crochet in chain 3 space chain 3 3 double_crochet in same chain 3 space chain 1 3 double_crochet in next chain 1 space chain 1 3 double_crochet in next chain 3 space chain 3 3 double_crochet in same chain 3 space chain 1 3 double_crochet in next chain 1 space chain 1 repeat around join w/ slip_stitch to top of beg chain 3 round 4 chain 3 double_crochet in next 2 double_crochet 5 double_crochet in next chain 3 space double_crochet in ea double_crochet and ea chain 1 space around to the last chain 3 space 5 double_crochet in that last chain 3 space double_crochet in each double_crochet and ea chain across join w/ slip_stitch to top of beg chain 3 round 5 chain 6 skip next 3 double_crochet slip_stitch in next double_crochet around to last st join w/ slip_stitch in 1st slip_stitch round 6 slip_stitch in next 2 chain of 1st chain 6 space slip_stitch in the same chain 6 space chain 6 slip_stitch in next chain 6 space chain 6 around join w/ slip_stitch to first slip_stitch rounds 7-15 repeat round 6 edging round 1 slip_stitch in next 2 chain of 1st chain 6 space single_crochet in the same chain space chain 3 single_crochet chain 3 in each chain space around join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet round 2 chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet double_crochet in ea chain and single_crochet around join w/ slip_stitch to top of beg chain 3 strap row 1 chain 3 double_crochet in next 2 double_crochet row 2 chain 3 turn double_crochet in next 2 double_crochet row 3-16 repeat row 2 till strap measures 11 long finish off sew to the other side and weave in ends if you need further help with this pattern please feel free to contact me at patti@dandeliondreamers com copyright © 2005 by patti gonsalves all rights reserved this pattern is for the personal use of the buyer only no part of this pattern may be reproduced adapted translated
